text.section:
An applicant for registration as a public safety solicitor or a registered public safety solicitor may not willfully or in a grossly negligent way:
submit to the Secretary of State a registration statement or other information that is materially false; or
commit a violation of this subtitle.
A principal owner or employee of the public safety solicitor may not willfully or in a grossly negligent way commit or cause to commit a violation of this subtitle.
